document.masterDocTitle: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

bibRefCitation.author: Krapp-Schickel
bibRefCitation.refString: Krapp-Schickel, T. (2003) Linguimaera Pirlot, 1936 (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Melitidae), a valid genus. Memoirs of Museum Victoria, 60 (2), 257 - 283.

.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined.
New South Wales
: 1 specimen , AM P.97880, east of Bermagui ( 36°26′S 150°14′06″E ),
119– 122 m
,
5 September 1994
, benthic sled, coll. P.B. Berents , RV Southern Surveyor (SS05/94/155)
;
1 specimen , AM P.62906, Black Rock , south of Smoky Cape ( 30°56′58″S 153°04′32″E ),
13 m
, under stones, airlift on SCUBA ,
13 February 2002
, coll. R.T. Springthorpe (
NSW 1870
)
.

South Australia : 2 specimens , SAMA C6504, northern side of Point Ellen Reef , Vivonne Bay , Kangaroo Island ( 35°59′13″S 137°12′25″E ),
2.5 –7.5 m
, boulders, sand,
26 January 1989
, coll. W. Zeidler and K. Gowlett- Holmes
;
2 specimens , SAMA C6503, Headland near Chinaman’s Hat Island , Yorke Peninsula ( 35°17′19″S 136°55′04″E ), just below low water mark,
6 November 1976
, coll. W. Zeidler and I.C. Kowanko
;
6 specimens , SAMA C7866, western side of Whittlebee Point , east of Ceduna ( 32°19′59″S 133°11′59″E ), depth unknown,
7 March 1993
, coll. W. Zeidler , K. L. Gowlett-Holmes and B. McHenry
.

Western Australia
: 4 specimens , AM P.79363, reef west of groyne, 2 km south of Cape Peron ( 32°16′S 115°41′E ),
6 m
, deep channels in limestone reef, sponges, gorgonaceans from cave in reef,
26 December 1983
, coll. J.K. Lowry (WA 295)
;
13 specimens , AM P.79415, near Mistaken Island , Vancouver Peninsula , King George Sound ( 35°04′S 117°56′E ),
6 m
, seagrass,
13 December 1983
, coll. R.T. Springthorpe (WA 121)
;
4 specimens , AM P.79468, Bramble Point , Princess Royal Harbour , Albany ( 35°03′S 117°53′E ),
1.5 m
, seagrass
Poisidonia australis
,
January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings (site 5)
;
5 specimens , AM P.79467, Bramble Point , Princess Royal Harbour , Albany ( 35°02′S 117°55′E ),
1.5 m
, seagrass
Posidonia australis
,
January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings (site 4)
;
1 specimen , AM P.79464, Bramble Point , Princess Royal Harbour , Albany ( 35°02′S 117°55′E ),
1.5 m
, seagrass
Posidonia australis
,
January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings (site 4)
;
3 specimens , AM P.79462, Bramble Point , Princess Royal Harbour ( 35°03′S 117°53′E ), depth unknown, seagrass
Posidonia australis
,
15 January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings , D. Walker and F.E. Wells
;
2 specimens , AM P.79465, Bramble Point , Princess Royal Harbour , Albany ( 35°02′S 117°55′E ),
1.5 m
, seagrass
Posidonia simulosa
,
January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings (site 10)
;
1 specimen , AM P.79463, Bramble Point , Princess Royal Harbour , Albany ( 35°02′S 117°55′E ),
1 m
, seagrass
Posidonia sinuosa
,
January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings (site 12)
;
1 specimen , AM P.79466, Quaranup , Princess Royal Harbour , Albany ( 35°03′S 117°55′E ),
2.5 m
,
January 1988
, coll. P.A. Hutchings (site 3).

Tasmania . 2 specimens , AM P.
97881, 100 m
north of Fleurieu Point , Freycinet Peninsula ( 42°10′S 148°15′E ),
10 m
, green algae including
Halophila
sp., airlift,
30 April 1991
, coll. S.J. Keable & R.T. Springthorpe on the Flying Scud (TAS 322)
;
1 specimen , AM P. 97882, off Hannant’s Bight , Cape Sorell ( 42°11.5′S 145°11.3′E ),
16 m
, pebbles & fine sediment, airlift,
27 April 1991
, coll. R.T. Springthorpe & P.M. Berents on the Flying Scud (TAS 287).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality.
Shelly Beach , Otago Harbour, New Zealand .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks.
Linguimaera tias
was recorded here as co-occuring in samples with
L. leo
, similar to findings by Krapp-Schickel, 2008 .

Distribution. New Zealand : Otago Harbour, Shelly Beach ( Barnard 1972b ). Australia , Victoria : Port Phillip Bay, Western Port, Portland Bay, Cape Northumberland , Bass Strait ( Krapp-Schickel 2003 ).
South Australia
: Sellicks Beach; Kangaroo Island ; Yorke Peninsula ( Sheard 1936; current study ).
Western Australia
: Albany; Cape Peron; King George Sound (current study).
